name: Iris Eden
description: The theocracy learned about Tomoko’s eye ability from the father after interrogating him. Yuta and Tomoko gets into approached by the guards, demanding to take her, but Yuta refused to give her up. They get into battle with the guards. The duo runs off confused as to why they were being attacked, suddenly they had decided to research for their dad. Afterwards the siblings found out that he was taken as a prisoner in the capital. Their idea was to be allowed themselves to get caught and taken to the capital’s prison. During event they fought the interrogator and convince him to join their party. They finally found their father and attempt to leave,but then he got assassinated by a guard when his family got out of there. After that the siblings went researching for their mother, which they had learned that she was in an area. They will start their new adventure to go research for her and if she was willing to help them end the theocracies corruption.
